source_info.purpose:
The funds that we get now are in form of donations from our members.
This Trust is a Public Charitable Trust. All its properties, funds and income thereof shall be applied solely for the purpose of attainment of the object of the trust without any discrimination. That the objectives of the Trust shall be wholly for the public and charitable purposes and incomes shall be applied for the same and accumulated in India for public &amp; charitable purposes.

The funds that we get now are in form of donations from the common people.
